```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

climate <- read.csv("data/climate_clean.csv")
disease <- read.csv("data/disease_clean.csv")
combined <- inner_join(climate, disease, by = c("State", "Year"))
```

```{r}
nat <- combined %>%
  group_by(Year) %>%
  summarize(
    MeanTemp = mean(Temp, na.rm = TRUE),
    TotalCases = sum(Cases, na.rm = TRUE)
  )

ggplot(nat, aes(MeanTemp, TotalCases)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  labs(
    title = "Relationship Between Temperature and Disease",
    x = "Average Temperature",
    y = "Total Disease Cases"
  )
```

```{r}
model <- lm(TotalCases ~ MeanTemp, data = nat)
summary(model)
```
